channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: How easy is a SIM swap hack and how does one guard against it?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: As SIM swap attacks are often seen as non-demanding in terms of technical skills, users must pay due diligence to their identity security.

item.title: A simple tile game is spiking daily txs on Sui Network: Data platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Launched in October, Sui 8192 is a fully-on-chain tile-sliding puzzle game that records each move as a transaction on the Sui Network.

item.title: Nifty News: Metaverse bank robberies, Trump NFT biz prefers crypto over cash, and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The Bank of America’s metaverse trains staff on resolving customer disputes or helps them relax by riding a virtual unicorn.

item.title: Binance completes integration of Bitcoin Lightning Network
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The news comes less than a month after Binance announced their plans to integrate Bit Lightning Network.

item.title: Aave Protocol launches stablecoin GHO on Ethereum mainnet, $2M minted
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Decentralized finance protocol Aave has finally launched its new algorithmic dollar-pegged stablecoin GHO on Ethereum.

item.title: Ripple case: SEC appeal unlikely as agency gains from ‘current confusion’ — Haun Ventures CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: An immediate appeal could potentially jeopardize the SEC’s “entire enforcement agenda” if it ends up losing, said Katie Haun of Haun Ventures.

item.title: Ripple decision is ‘troublesome on multiple fronts,’ says former SEC official
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: John Reed Stark, a former attorney in the Securities and Exchange Commission’s Enforcement Division, says the ruling in favor of Ripple Labs “resides on shaky ground.”

item.title: Bitcoin price support at $30K opens the door for gains from UNI, ARB, AAVE and MKR
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: BTC price is back in its range, potentially given opportunities for UNI, ARB, AAVE and MKR to move higher.

item.title: Celo blockchain proposes return to Ethereum ecosystem, transition to L2
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: According to cLabs, the Celo transition would include leveraging OP Stack as the architecture to become an Ethereum L2 blockchain.

item.title: Buying the dip? Record 3.8% of the Bitcoin supply last moved at $30.2K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin on-chain data confirms the significance of $30,000 as a point of interest for BTC accumlation.

item.title: Enterprise blockchain: ‘Ethereum for Business’ explains key use cases
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Paul Brody’s “Ethereum for Business” gives a basic overview of enterprise Ethereum, while providing real-world use cases of how EY clients leverage the technology.

item.title: A new age in investing: The transformative power of asset tokenization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Chris Jones
item.description: From real estate to franchising, and from renewable energy to Hollywood, tokenization has the potential to transform the way we do business.

item.title: Senator Lummis urges clear crypto regulations after XRP ruling
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The outcome of the case could establish a precedent that shapes the regulatory landscape for digital assets within the United States.

item.title: US ‘dominates’ crypto startup funding in Q2: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: United States-based crypto startups attracted 45% of all venture capital funding invested in the crypto industry, followed by the United Kingdom (7.7%) and Singapore (5.7%).

item.title: SEC could be waiting ‘years’ to file appeal in Ripple case — Brad Garlinghouse
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.category: United States Securities and Exchange Commission
item.description: According to Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse, an appeal by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission would only reinforce Judge Torres’s decision that XRP is not a security.

item.title: XRP is not a security, Celsius CEO arrested on criminal charges, and more: Hodler’s Digest, July 9-15
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: Ripple Labs has partially defeated the SEC in court, triggering a price increase for XRP. A billion-dollar fine was imposed on Celsius Network by the FTC, and its CEO was arrested for fraud.

item.title: ‘Multichain was a big blow,’ says Andre Cronje as Fantom TVL slumps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Fantom’s TVL dropped from over $364 million in early May to about $70 million on July 14. At its peak in 2022, Fantom’s TVL topped $7.5 billion.

item.title: Ron DeSantis vows to ban CDBCs in the US if elected president
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Speaking at the Family Leadership Summit on July 14, DeSantis promised to ban CBDCs in the United States if elected president.

item.title: Project roadmap or token price — Which is most important?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ray Salmond
item.description: Content creator KryptosChain explains why a project’s roadmap and token price are important to its success, as well as the upgrades to the Polkadot ecosystem that excite him most.

item.title: Entity representing Binance customers seeks compensation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The mysterious entity called Eeon seeks compensation from Binance and the U.S. SEC, equivalent to 20% of the daily value of withheld funds per customer, totaling $1000 per day.

item.title: AI signals vs. human intuition: Decision-making in crypto trading
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke
item.description: AI and human intuition together can make for powerful trading tools.

item.title: ARK Invest sells more Coinbase shares, eyes Meta platforms, Robinhood
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest is actively investing in Meta Platforms and Robinhood Markets shares.

item.title: Synthetix takes on counterparty risks with Infinex derivatives exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The upcoming exchange will cater to novice and experienced traders by offering features similar to centralized exchanges.

item.title: 5 peer-to-peer (P2P) lending platforms for borrowers and lenders
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover five platforms — Aave, Compound, MakerDAO, dYdX and Fulcrum — that are transforming lending and borrowing through decentralization.

item.title: SEC accepts BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF application, signaling regulatory review
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The SEC’s acknowledgment indicates the commencement of the official review process for BlackRock’s ETF proposal.

item.title: Nifty News: The Flash goes Web3, Yuga Labs still working hard on ‘audacious’ Otherside project and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The Sandbox added a new major IP to its virtual world, a portfolio management startup raised $3.6 million and The Flash is getting NFTs.

item.title: Allowing Coinbase to go public was not a ‘blessing’ from regulators — SEC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The SEC argued that just because it approves an S-1 filing from a company does not mean the firm is not operating or will not operate in “violation of the law.”

item.title: It’s time for the SEC to settle with Coinbase and Ripple
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By J.W. Verret
item.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission should recognize it’s time to settle its cases against Coinbase and Ripple Labs.

item.title: Coinbase pauses staking services in four US states following regulators’ orders
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to the U.S. crypto exchange, only regulators’ actions in California, New Jersey, South Carolina and Wisconsin require a pause in staking additional assets.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.
